title: The Naked Revenge Gameshow
description: Four girls compete in a cruel gameshow to win a cash prize. One by one, the girls are eliminated and each loser is left naked and humiliated in increasingly ingenious ways. Wannabe TV starlet Christy, naive churchgoer Rebecca, conceited student Suki and surprised member of the audience Rachel go head to head. Which girl will win?
author: Cheri Grade
